	NONE, 
	PART, 
	ALL, 
}

	a: u8,

    Color_Type ¶
    Source

    Color_Type :: enum u32 {
	TEXT, 
	SELECTION_BG, 
	BORDER, 
	WINDOW_BG, 
	TITLE_BG, 
	TITLE_TEXT, 
	PANEL_BG, 
	BUTTON, 
	BUTTON_HOVER = 8, 
	BUTTON_FOCUS = 9, 
	BASE, 
	BASE_HOVER   = 11, 
	BASE_FOCUS   = 12, 
	SCROLL_BASE, 
	SCROLL_THUMB, 
}
    Related Procedures With Parameters
    • draw_control_frame
    • draw_control_text

    Command ¶
    Source

    Command :: struct {
	variant: Command_Variant,
	size:    i32,
}

    Command_Clip ¶
    Source

    Command_Clip :: struct {
	using command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
}

    Command_Icon ¶
    Source

    Command_Icon :: struct {
	using command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
	id:      Icon,
	color:   Color,
}

    Command_Jump ¶
    Source

    Command_Jump :: struct {
	using command: Command,
	dst:     rawptr,
}

    Command_Rect ¶
    Source

    Command_Rect :: struct {
	using command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
	color:   Color,
}

    Command_Text ¶
    Source

    Command_Text :: struct {
	using command: Command,
	font:    Font,
	pos:     Vec2,
	color:   Color,
	str:     string,
}

    Command_Variant ¶
    Source

    Command_Variant :: union {
	^Command_Jump, 
	^Command_Clip, 
	^Command_Rect, 
	^Command_Text, 
	^Command_Icon, 
}
    Related Procedures With Returns
    • next_command_iterator

    Container ¶
    Source

    Container :: struct {
	head:         ^Command,
	tail:         ^Command,
	rect:         Rect,
	body:         Rect,
	content_size: Vec2,
	scroll:       Vec2,
	zindex:       i32,
	open:         b32,
}
    Related Procedures With Parameters
    • bring_to_front
    Related Procedures With Returns
    • get_container
    • get_current_container

    Context ¶
    Source

    Context :: struct {
	// callbacks 
	text_width:          proc(font: Font, str: string) -> i32,
	text_height:         proc(font: Font) -> i32,
	draw_frame:          proc(ctx: ^Context, rect: Rect, colorid: Color_Type),
	// core state 
	_style:              Style,
	style:               ^Style,
	hover_id:            Id,
	focus_id:            Id,
	last_id:             Id,
	last_rect:           Rect,
	last_zindex:         i32,
	updated_focus:       b32,
	frame:               Frame_Index,
	hover_root:          ^Container,
	next_hover_root:     ^Container,
	scroll_target:       ^Container,
	number_edit_buf:     [127]u8,
	number_edit_len:     int,
	number_edit_id:      Id,
	// stacks 
	command_list:        Stack($T=u8, $N=262144),
	root_list:           Stack($T=^Container, $N=32),
	container_stack:     Stack($T=^Container, $N=32),
	clip_stack:          Stack($T=Rect, $N=32),
	id_stack:            Stack($T=Id, $N=32),
	layout_stack:        Stack($T=Layout, $N=16),
	// retained state pools 
	container_pool:      [48]Pool_Item,
	containers:          [48]Container,
	treenode_pool:       [48]Pool_Item,
	// input state 
	mouse_pos:           Vec2,
	last_mouse_pos:      Vec2,
	mouse_delta:         Vec2,
	scroll_delta:        Vec2,
	mouse_down_bits:     Mouse_Set,
	mouse_pressed_bits:  Mouse_Set,
	mouse_released_bits: Mouse_Set,
	key_down_bits:       Key_Set,
	key_pressed_bits:    Key_Set,
	_text_store:         [1024]u8,
	text_input:          strings.Builder,
	// uses `_text_store` as backing store with nil_allocator.
	textbox_state:       text_edit.State,
	textbox_offset:      i32,
}

    Layout ¶
    Source

    Layout :: struct {
	body:       Rect,
	next:       Rect,
	position:   Vec2,
	size:       Vec2,
	max:        Vec2,
	widths:     [16]i32,
	items:      i32,
	item_index: i32,
	next_row:   i32,
	next_type:  Layout_Type,
	indent:     i32,
}
    Related Procedures With Returns

	NONE     = 0, 
	RELATIVE = 1, 
	ABSOLUTE = 2, 
}

    Style ¶
    Source

    Style :: struct {
	font:           Font,
	size:           Vec2,
	padding:        i32,
	spacing:        i32,
	indent:         i32,
	title_height:   i32,
	footer_height:  i32,
	scrollbar_size: i32,
	thumb_size:     i32,
	colors:         [Color_Type]Color,
}
